name: Exodus (itch) (ralphyua, p1rateking, JamesMusic, Xlial, Calexper)
description:
Awakening at the edge of the world, you are one of hundreds discarded to the darkness - and seemingly on the run from… +++Message redacted+++.

Run, swing and dash across an industrial hell, learn powerful abilities and traverse increasingly hazardous neon environments. Meet fellow robot compatriots and discover a sinister plot - just make sure you keep moving.
